nodes.text: Caliban was a weapons manufacturer based on the planet Calabosh-2. Caliban was eventually nationalized by the Galactic Empire when it was found they were intentionally marketing their products to the Rebel Alliance and other insurrectionists during the Galactic Civil War. Imperial Munitions, a major weapons and equipment manufacturer for the Empire, received most of Caliban's assets. SoroSuub later bought the design for the Model X heavy blaster pistol, using it for the basis of their Renegade heavy blaster pistol.
